alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 29 at 9:24AM EST until January 29 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern, northwest and southern New Jersey and southeast Pennsylvania. * WHEN...Until 4 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow, heavy at times, will continue through late morning before ending by early afternoon. Winds will remain strong, with blowing snow possible after the precipitation ends. Travel may remain hazardous well after the snow has ended.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Delaware; Eastern Montgomery; Lower Bucks; Philadelphia
